get.summary: Gets a list of Addresss

200.description: Returns a list of Addresss

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Address object that needs to be added

get.summary: Lookup a specific Address by ID

parameters.name: Address_id
parameters.description: ID of Address to lookup

200.description: An array with the entity Address

put.description: Sends an updated version of an entire Address to the server

parameters.name: Address_Body
parameters.description: Address_id that needs to be updated

200.description: The Address has been successfully updated

delete.description: Delets an entire Address from the db

parameters.name: Address_Body
parameters.description: Address_id that needs to be updated

200.description: The Address has been successfully deleted
